description:
As a Admin
I want to able to navigate to the 'Manage User' page 
So that I can access its sorting, deleting, and assigning functionalities

steps.name: Given  Admin is on dashboard page after Login and clicks User on the navigation bar
When  Admin clicks on the "Phone Number" sort icon by 1 click
